name: UnityInstallTask
description: Azure Pipelines task to install Unity editors and modules on the executing machine.
helpMarkDown: Use this task to install Unity editors and modules required to build your project on the executing agent. [More Information](https://unitydevops.com/docs/unity-install-task).
author: Dinomite Studios

inputs.name: versionSelectionMode
inputs.label: Unity version to install
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select which Unity version to install. You can either use the project's version or specify a version yourself.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Unity editor version to install, e.g. value: `2020.3.1f1`.

inputs.name: revision
inputs.label: Revision
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Unity editor version revision to install, e.g. value: `c7b5465681fb`.

messages.failUnityInstall: Failed to install specified Unity editor / modules!
